resources.string: Think of an animal, and I\'ll guess what it is. Ready?
I give up! What animal were you thinking of?
What question can you think of that would distinguish %1$s %2$s from %3$s %4$s?
If you were thinking of %1$s %2$s, and I asked you \"%3$s\" would the answer be yes or no?
Great! I know a new animal!\nWould you like to play again?
Yay! I guessed it! Would you like to play again?
Is the animal you\'re thinking of %1$s %2$s?
